meanings.definition: Copies made by a photographic process
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful photoreproductions of famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: She ordered photoreproductions of her family photos to give as gifts.
meanings.sent3: The photoreproductions of the old photographs made everyone look like they were from a different era.
meanings.sent4: The photoreproductions of the documents were so clear, it felt like holding the originals.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the photoreproductions was so high that it was hard to distinguish them from the real paintings.

meanings.definition: The act or process of reproducing something through photography
meanings.sent1: The photoreproductions of the event captured every detail perfectly.
meanings.sent2: Photoreproductions of nature scenes are popular in art galleries.
meanings.sent3: The photoreproductions of the crime scene helped the investigators piece together what happened.
meanings.sent4: Her photoreproductions of the cityscape were like frozen moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The photoreproductions of the fashion show highlighted the intricate designs of the clothing.
